request_examples.title: Delete a pet by ID
request_examples.description: Deletes a single pet resource identified by its numeric ID.

request_examples.title: Delete a pet by ID with verbose output
request_examples.description: Deletes a pet and displays full response headers to confirm the 204 status.

request_examples.title: Delete a pet by ID with custom headers
request_examples.description: Deletes a pet while sending an Accept header and an authorization token.

response_examples.title: 204 No Content — Successful deletion
response_examples.description: The pet was found and successfully deleted. The response body is empty.

response_examples.title: 404 Not Found — Pet does not exist
response_examples.description: No pet with the specified ID exists in the store.

body.message: Pet not found: no pet exists with id 9999

response_examples.title: 400 Bad Request — Invalid ID format
response_examples.description: The supplied ID is not a valid integer value.

body.message: Invalid pet ID: 'abc' is not a valid integer

response_examples.title: 500 Internal Server Error — Unexpected server failure
response_examples.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server while attempting to delete the pet.

body.message: Internal server error: unable to process the delete request
